arts.ttl: Pisa vs Verona: first win up for grabs
arts.sum: In Tuscany, the official meetings between the two teams total 28: 13 wins for the Nerazzurri (Pisa), 9 draws, and 6 victories for the Scaligeri (Verona). Pisa and Verona are two of the 4 teams still without wins in Serie A 2025/26, along with Genoa and Fiorentina.

Pisa and Verona are just two sides left in Serie A without a win so far this season. Pisa lost 4-0 last time out against Bologna and will be hoping to find some form against a side struggling like th...
